I played this game for the first time after a couple of beers, and i have to say, it is kind of a shitshow ... when you are dunk this game punishes you, a lot. It kind of makes you believe drinking so much was a bad idea. And we all know, that this is not true.
My wife showed the my hours on this game during divorce court. 10/10 would play again.
